annotations:
Dear Sir / Ma’am,
Good Day,
Please Propose Suitable Cargo for Voyage for Period Tonnage :
Opening At Colombo - 21st August, 2024
MV Happy Hero
ABT 10,090 MTDW TWEEN DECK GENERAL CARGO VESSEL
BUILT APRIL 2002 AT SHIN KURUSHIMA DOCKYARD
PANAMANIAN FLAG - NK CLASS – IMO 9254276
LOA  100.60M / LBP 93.50M / BM 18.80M / DM 13.00M / DRAFT 9.219M
GRT 6,381T / NRT 3,658T
TWO HOLDS (LOWER HOLDS ARE BOX SHAPE)
HOLD CAPACITY GRAIN 13,999.08 M3 / BALE 12,857.98 M3
DECK CRANE 23T X 2
DERRICK 15T X 1
( FIGURES ARE ALL ABOUT WITHOUT GUARANTEE).
Pleased to Hear!!
Best Regards
Sonia Bhardwaj
Chartering Department
Creare Vincere Sea Shipping Co. LLC
Phone : +966 597838202
Email: chart@crearevincere.com
Website: www.crearevincere.com
